description: Demolition of existing rear extension and roof terrace and construction of a single-storey side and rear extension at semi-basement level. Internal alterations at semi-basement level.
decision_conditions: <p><span style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 14px; white-space: pre-wrap;">Details to be approved (general) </span></p><p><span style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px; white-space: pre-wrap;"><span style="font-size: 14px;">Detailed drawings and full particulars of the following shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority prior to the commencement of works.&nbsp; The works shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved</span>:</span></p><p><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; white-space: pre-wrap;">a. Details of all new and replacement external windows and doors in the form of a 1:20 elevation showing the panel and pane pattern, together with 1:5 sections of the frames and 1:1 sections of any glazing bars or a manufacturer’s specification providing the same details;</span></p><p><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; white-space: pre-wrap;">b. Details of the proposed green roof in the form of a typical 1:5 section or manufacturer’s specification providing the same details.</span></p><p><span style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px; white-space: pre-wrap;"><span style="font-size: 14px;">REASON</span>: <span style="font-size: 14px;">T</span><span style="font-size: 14px;">o ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the building</span>.</span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-style: italic; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Materials to match existing building</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">All new external facing and roofing materials in respect of all the works hereby approved (and any other incidental works carried out in this connection) shall match those of the existing building in respect of materials used, detailed execution and finished appearance including type, size, colour, bond, pointing, coursing, jointing, profile and texture [delete as appropriate], unless otherwise first agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority .&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the building. </span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-style: italic; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Details of Materials</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-style: italic; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Full details, including physical samples, of all the materials to be used on the external surfaces of the building, including, but not limited to [specify elements here], shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, in writing, before any work commences on site. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the building.</span></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-0547cea1-7fff-2eb9-9497-7ea2cc4d49eb"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;background-color:#ffffff;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><span style="font-size: 14px;">Structural engineer’s report: demolition and excavation</span></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;background-color:#ffffff;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><span style="font-size: 16px; font-style: italic;"><br></span>Before the start of the relevant part of the works, proposals for any structural works shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority and shall be carried out accordingly.&nbsp; The required detail is the submission of a detailed report and method statement by a suitably qualified and experienced chartered structural engineer, addressing the following areas</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><span style="font-size: 14px;">:</span> </span><br></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;background-color:#ffffff;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;"><br></span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap;">a.Detailing the engineer’s qualifications, relevant experience and supervisory role;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;background-color:#ffffff;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap;">b.Explaining how the existing structure stands;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;background-color:#ffffff;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap;">c.Detailing the method by which the existing structure is to be supported and protected during the works so as to ensure the structural stability and integrity of all the elements which are to be retained (the temporary works);</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;background-color:#ffffff;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap;">d.Confirming how damage to the building or surrounding buildings and structures will be avoided and how the safety and stability of the historic building fabric will be ensured;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;background-color:#ffffff;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span><span style="font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">e.Detailing the structural interventions to ensure that the building will stand in the future, including details (for example and not limited to) of any new foundation design, underpinning, steelwork and other strengthening and their locations and methods of fixing and installation, with sketches as necessary (the permanent works)</span><span style="font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 16px;">.</span><span style="font-family: Arial; white-space: pre;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Arial; white-space: pre;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Arial; white-space: pre;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Arial; white-space: pre;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Arial; white-space: pre;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Arial; white-space: pre;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;background-color:#ffffff;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial; white-space: pre;"><br></span><span style="font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 11pt;">All structural works shall be carried out strictly in accordance with the details so approved.&nbsp; All structural works shall be carried out by hand.&nbsp; No other excavation or structural works are authorised by this consent without prior approval of the details.</span><span style="font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-size: 16px; white-space: pre-wrap;">  </span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;background-color:#ffffff;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-size: 16px; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;background-color:#ffffff;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-size: 16px; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON: </span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap;">To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the building. </span></p>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
